description:
• Changed the type of guitar to acoustics (nylon).
• The capo is removed.
• All the slides from the open strings (for example, 0-1 or 0-3) were replaced with a hummer-on. 
• Likewise, all the slides to the open strings (for example, 4-0) were replaced by pull-offs (slides were a mistake).
• The final chord was changed from {3204} to {32003}, which sounds much nicer.
• The tempo was slowed down from 120 bpm to 105 bpm.
title: Every Breath You Take (Fingerstyle)
